#include "cstdio"
#include "iostream"
#include "algorithm"
#include "cstring"
#define rep(i, n) for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
#define runtime() ((double)clock() / CLOCKS_PER_SEC)
using namespace std;

int ans, n, m, h[1000010];
void work(){
	memset(h, 0, sizeof(h));
	scanf("%d", &n);
	m = 0;
	rep(i,n){
		int x;
		scanf("%d", &x);
		h[x]++;
		if(x>m) m = x;
	}
	ans = 0;
	for(int i=m; i>=1; i--){
		int t = 0;
		for(int j = i; j<=m; j+=i){
			t += h[j];
			if(t>1) break;
		}
		if(t>1) {ans = i;break;}
	}
	printf("%d\n", ans);
}

int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	int T;
	cin>>T;
	for(;T--;)
	work();  
//cout<<runtime();
	return 0;
}
